output.sentences: The gentleman did not seem too happy to be there forcing a smile for the picture.
The guy next to him was having a good time.
The guests came hungry for a delicious meal.
The waitress was careful with the cake and tried not to burn herself with the hot candles.
We were successful in getting the guests at the party to blow into those party thingies.
